output.sentences: The Catoctin 50K Run is an annual event that is very important to its region.
Though not nationally known it draws running enthusiasts from all over the world.
Unlike popular urban marathons, the Catoctin Run goes along a country trail.
The markers this with a huge man cutout along the trail are very important and must be clearly visible so people don't get lost.
At the end of the run people relax and cool down with a sense of accomplishment no matter what their finish time.
